page.title: 17Shopping in Hellesdon
page.content: Hellesdon has a wide variety of shops in fact there is no need for anyone to drive more than three miles from their home to get most of their family needs. There's only one newsagent on the Reepham Rd but other shops deliver newspapers. There is a stationary shop, shoe shop, foodstore, post office and an electrical shop. {The Industrial Estate} Part of Norwich Airport has been turned into an industrial estate and well known local firms operate on it eg. Palgrave Brown, Anglian Windows, Hellesdon Leather co, Nurdin and Peacock, Willhire Truck Rentals and Acrow Fencing. Further on, on the other side of Fifers Lane there is Vulcan Road which has a few more nationally known firms eg.Queensway and Payless D.I.Y. It's a big estate with many big firms working on both sides of Fifers Lane.
